commit.message:
Cleanup `textInteractionFlags` for `QLabel`

Qt::TextSelectableByMouse - keep unchanged.
Qt::TextSelectableByKeyboard - removed due to showing a text cursor even
after leaving the label.
Qt::LinksAccessibleByMouse - used only by `helpmessagedialog.ui`.

verification.payload:
tree 9c88bc023bc2606dbf113c53d9ed3839baac5d2e
parent 754a00d55f30f6112a1b68cb0bec5d59565096d1
author Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1540502215 +0300
committer Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1540503718 +0300

Cleanup `textInteractionFlags` for `QLabel`

Qt::TextSelectableByMouse - keep unchanged.
Qt::TextSelectableByKeyboard - removed due to showing a text cursor even
after leaving the label.
Qt::LinksAccessibleByMouse - used only by `helpmessagedialog.ui`.
